# eigengrau

### /ˈʔaɪ̯gn̩ˌgʁaʊ̯/

- "own gray"

- the uniform dark gray background that many people report seeing in the absence of light<sup>1</sup>

- the hex color of eigengrau is "#16161d"

.footnote[
[1] [wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eigengrau)
]

# eigengrau

This deck is based a gradation palette based on eigengrau

The hex code values are

- "#16161d" (eigengrau)
- "#47474e"
- "#7e7e85"
- "#babac8"
- "#fafaff" (not quite pure white)
